summary: Diff implements plan poster storage on the backend and adds frontend poster rendering plus filename-to-title matching for “Jeevan Utsav”. However, the structured plan content shape shown in the diff does not include an explicit “Overview” field as required by REQ-2’s acceptance criteria.

missing_requirements.requirement: Created/updated plan includes non-empty structured content fields with (at minimum) an "Overview" section that has text.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend StructuredPlan type in the diff contains fields {title, analysis, goals, hypothesis, experiment, result} and does not show an "Overview" field/section. Based on the provided diff summary, the minimum "Overview" section requirement is not directly implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Added data migration logic and expanded backend state to include enquiries/enquiryCounter.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; BuildRequest is focused on plan poster upload/display and OCR simulation for plans.

hallucinated_features.description: Marketing/homepage content changes (e.g., removing Testimonials references, updating Hero/About/Services/Contact/Footer, SEO/title changes, Tailwind/theme updates).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest and outside the LIC Plans poster/upload scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Added generated static poster assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/ (e.g., lic-jivan-utsav.dim_668x1086.jpg).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies using the uploaded file and storing it as a blob (no separate gallery/CDN/static asset pipeline was requested).
